components.description:
A segment of ginger root with light brown skin and a yellowish core.

Can be used to talk about ginger root or roots in general. Can also be used to talk about spice, flavor, cooking, or baking. May also be also be used to talk redheads.

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.
